inclusion.criterion: cirrhosis (either by history, serology or imaging)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: medium or large esophageal varices on variceal screening esophagogastroduodenoscopy (EGD)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients on beta blockers or nitrates for any underlying condition
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has cirrhosis and medium or large esophageal varices, but is not pregnant and does not take beta blockers or nitrates.
